about.summary: This is an accessible template for 'pkgdown'. It uses two bootstrap themes, Flatly and Darkly and utilizes the 'prefers-color-scheme' CSS variable to automatically serve either of the two based on user’s operating system setting, or allowing them to manually toggle between them.

This is an accessible template for 'pkgdown'. It uses two bootstrap themes, Flatly and Darkly and utilizes the 'prefers-color-scheme' CSS variable to automatically serve either of the two based on user’s operating system setting, or allowing them to manually toggle between them.

name: r-preferably
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-preferably
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/preferably_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/preferably/preferably_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 278849da19ae63f3184ee8575b68118ab766c18dc6f099077b411ca1be4c8eb1

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-knitr
    - r-pkgdown
    - r-rmarkdown
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-knitr
    - r-pkgdown
    - r-rmarkdown

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('preferably')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('preferably')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://preferably.amirmasoudabdol.name
  license: MIT
  summary: "This is an accessible template for 'pkgdown'. It uses two bootstrap themes, Flatly
    and Darkly and utilizes the 'prefers-color-scheme' CSS variable to automatically
    serve either of the two based on user\u2019s operating system setting, or allowing
    them to manually toggle between them."
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE
# Type: Package
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - zero323
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: preferably
# Title: A 'pkgdown' Template
# Version: 0.4
# Authors@R: person(given = "Amir Masoud", family = "Abdol", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "i@amirmasoudabdol.name")
# Maintainer: Amir Masoud Abdol <i@amirmasoudabdol.name>
# Description: This is an accessible template for 'pkgdown'. It uses two bootstrap themes, Flatly and Darkly and utilizes the 'prefers-color-scheme' CSS variable to automatically serve either of the two based on users operating system setting, or allowing them to manually toggle between them.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://preferably.amirmasoudabdol.name
# BugReports: https://github.com/amirmasoudabdol/preferably/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0)
# Imports: pkgdown, knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Language: en-US
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2021-12-02 15:13:27 UTC; amabdol
# Author: Amir Masoud Abdol [aut, cre]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2021-12-02 15:30:02 UTC
